about_the_game: The official soundtrack for Irony Curtain: From Matryoshka with Love by Arkadiusz Reikowski, known also as the composer for Layers of Fear, Seven: Days Long Gone, Kholat, and >observer_. The soundtrack includes the piece Irony Curtain, written by Peter McConnell, composer of soundtracks for Monkey Island, Sam & Max, Full Throttle, Grim Fandango & Broken Age.
